attributes.action: Pay ALL social care workers the covid bonus
attributes.additional_details: Many councils have not paid the bonus.  Liverpool,  for example.  The bonus should not depend on where you work
attributes.background: Pay every single social care worker who worked during lockdown the same bonus in every Borough

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Social Care Bonus was a payment from the Welsh Government to social care workers in Wales. We're not aware of a social care bonus scheme in the UK, although individual local authorities may have opted to provide these themselves. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as paying all social care workers in England a one-off bonus.
